content.prompt: The environmental processes illustrated by the two graphs are most closely associated with

choices.label: An increase in biodiversity in many regions
A decline in soil fertility rates in many regions
An increase in epidemic diseases in many regions
A decline in air and water quality in many regions

topic.text: 9.3: Technological Advances - Debates about the Environment after 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
